{{Wireless embedded system |brand=USRobotics |model=USR5462 |revision= |upc=738168036721 |ean= |asin=B0006HIMXE |price= |est_release_date=12/01/2004 |fcc_date=09/20/2004 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG4005D-U5 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=RAXWG4005D-U5 |ic_id=550A-15021 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intersil |cpu1_model=ISL3893 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Atmel |fla1_model=AT49BV162A-70TI |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-7 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3893 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3686B |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996L |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=USR5462 |default_ssid_regex=^USR5462$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:C0:49 |oui_eth=00:C0:49 }} {{TagLine|U.S. Robotics 802.11g 54Mbps Wireless Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=USRobotics|vs_id=5462}}
"P/N: 141400520010J REV: 01". "MADE IN TAIWAN" is silkscreened on the board.
Per the [http://www.usr.com/support/5462/5462-files/5462-ug.pdf manual] and supporting data from WiGLE, the default SSID is USR5462.
This device was part of the USR5470 802.11g Wireless Starter Kit (router + USB stick).
*[http://isl3893.wikidot.com/usrobotics-usr5462 On isl3893.wikidot.com] (pictures)
